dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing, Inc. Sends Google Claims of Copyright Infringement (#'s 7 and
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[Private]
Chicago, IL 60647
February 21, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.seologic.com/search-engines.php.

Search Query: "you're not getting the traffic you want, there can only be two"
(http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&q=%22you%27re+not+getting+the+traffic+you+want%2C+there+can+only+be+two%22) and "Success on the Internet starts with search engine success" (http://www.google.com/search?sourceid=navclient&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&q=%22Success+on+the+Internet+starts+with+search+engine+success%22).

Infringing Web Pages:
http://www.maxvista.com/webpromotion.htm

Contact Information from site: MaxVista Design, [Private]
DN31 2HS Tel/Fax: [Private] Mob: [Private] Email: [Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

/s/ [Private]

[Private], President and CEO
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
p. [Private]
f. [Private]
e. [Private]


Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
